original_text: But seeing the man who was healed standing beside them, they had nothing to say in opposition.
korean_text: 또 병 나은 사람이 그들과 함께 서 있는 것을 보고 비난할 말이 없는지라

sentences.original_text: But seeing the man who was healed standing beside them
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 고침받은 그 사람이 그들 곁에 서 있는 것을 보고

sentences.original_text: they had nothing to say in opposition.
